base.welcome:
Welcome to Crown Heights Mutual Aid Slack!

Check out the quick welcome doc below.

newVolunteer.message:
Thanks for signing up to volunteer!
 If you want to call neighbors in need, please see if there are any upcoming intake training shifts:

trainedVolunteer.message: You've been trained for intake! Here are some links for ya:

volunteerSignUp.message:
Your Slack email isn't in our volunteer records.
If you want to get involved more please fill it out!
volunteerSignUp.errorMessage: If you already submitted one, it might take this page a few minutes to update ðŸ’¦ðŸ’¾ðŸ’¾ðŸ’¦

error.noRequest: We couldn't find a request with that code. Please make sure it exists in the Requests table.
error.noVolunteer: No intake volunteer was assigned to the request ID you entered :/
error.alreadyAssigned: This request looks like it already has a delivery volunteer!
error.noPermission:
It doesn't look like you are assigned to this request :/
Let #tech know if we messed up.
error.airtableError:
Error updating the Request in Airtable. Please try again.

 You can update Airtable and message the delivery volunteer manually if it still doesn't work :/
error.default: An error occured. Let us know in #tech

postNotify.message: {{delivererName}} you're on! You'll get a DM soon with details :slightly_smiling_face:

modal.messageIntro: You found a delivery volunteer! ðŸŽ‰ðŸŽ‰
modal.message: If you give us the request code, we'll update all the airtable info and start a DM between you both.
modal.dmOption: Start a DM with request info between you and the assignee
modal.threadOption: Reply to the thread with confirmation
modal.title: Assign to Delivery

error.noVolunteer: No volunteer with email: {{- userEmail}}. Did you use your slack email to sign up?
error.noPendingRequests:
Couldn't find any pending requests. Do you have requests assigned to you in the 'Delivery Needed' state?
 It's also possible you already posted this in Slack using the bot.

message.intro: Hey <!channel> we have a new request from our neighbor {{firstName}} at {{streets}} in *{{quadrant}}*
message.outro:
*Want to volunteer to help our neighbor{{firstName}}?* Comment on this thread and {{- intakeSlackId}} will follow up with more details.
_Reminder: Please donâ€™t volunteer for delivery if you have any COVID-19/cold/flu-like symptoms, or have come into contact with someone thatâ€™s tested positive._

post.deliveryCongrats: :tada: Shout out to {{- deliveryVolunteer}} for volunteering to help! :tada:

error.notAMessage: This shortcut can only be used on messages.
error.notBotPost: You can only edit messages posted by the bot.
error.noPermission: You aren't permitted to edit this message.

button.confirmMessage: The post cannot be un-deleted and any threads will remain.

label.edit: You can edit the post's content:
label.deletion: Or, if you'd like you can remove the post entirely:

message.intro:
Hey neighbors!
:tada::tada: {{- deliverer}} completed a delivery and could use reimbursement! :tada::tada:
message.outro:
*Want to send money?* Please send any amount to a payment method above and then reply to this post with the amount sent.
The bot isn't smart and will register the first number it finds, so please try and only include one dollar amount!
This example works fine:
> Sent 20!

code.default: @chma-admins this request is missing a code!
